data.eml:eml: A new species of the catfish genus Cordylancistrus (Siluriformes, Loricariidae) from the Magdalena River, Tolima, Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Provenzano, Francisco, Villa-Navarro, Francisco A. (2017): A new species of the catfish genus Cordylancistrus (Siluriformes, Loricariidae) from the Magdalena River, Tolima, Colombia. Zootaxa 4294 (5): 522-530, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4294.5.2
